content.rendered: Caroline joined Regent in 2009 when Dr Selva Pankaj was appointed as CEO. Since that time, she has been fully involved with all activities of Regent and a key part of the Regent College London’s growth. She graduated on Business and French from Royal Holloway University. She is an excellent writer and also assist the CEO on all his business activities and also takes the role of compliance.
